alias.send: local index = tonumber("%1") if (not index) then Send("get all.coins") return end local cmd = "get all.coins %d.corpse" Send(cmd:format(index))
local target = trim("%2") local index = tonumber("%1") or 1 local cmd = "get %s %d.corpse" Send(cmd:format(target, index))
local index = tonumber("%1") or 1 local cmd = "look in %d.corpse" Send(cmd:format(index))
local targets = trim("%1") targets = targets:gsub("%s+", " ") targets = utils.split(targets, " ") for _, target in ipairs(targets) do Send("look " .. target) end

require("commas") require("tprint") require("var") require("wait") local const = require("fk_const")
-------------------------------------------------- -- Core --------------------------------------------------
Core = {}
function Core.initialize() Core.add_accelerators() Core.add_tab_completion_items() end
function Core.add_accelerators() local accelerators = { {key="ALT+G", send="group"}, {key="ALT+P", send="config +prompt;config -prompt", to="execute"}, {key="ALT+T", send="time"}, {key="ALT+W", send="who"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD1", send="look southwest"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD2", send="look south"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD3", send="look southeast"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD4", send="look west"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD5", send="scan", to="execute"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD6", send="look east"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD7", send="look northwest"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD8", send="look north"}, {key="ALT+NUMPAD9", send="look northeast"}, {key="ALT+SUBTRACT", send="look up"}, {key="ALT+ADD", send="look down"}, } for _, accelerator in ipairs(accelerators) do AcceleratorTo( accelerator.key, accelerator.send, sendto[accelerator.to or "world"] ) end end
function Core.add_tab_completion_items() local items = { "<clear>", "<nofunctions>", "all.", "all.coins", "corpse" } for _, item in ipairs(items) do ShiftTabCompleteItem(item) end end

-------------------------------------------------- -- Plugin Callbacks --------------------------------------------------
function OnPluginInstall() Utility.initialize() end
function OnPluginEnable() OnPluginInstall() end
function OnPluginClose() Utility.deinitialize() end
function OnPluginDisable() OnPluginClose() end
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) end
